title: 3D Simulation-Based Programming Fundamentals Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing collaborative problem-solving in a 3D multi-user environment based on the Community of Inquiry (CoI) model.

learning_goals: Learners can implement conditional/loop-based programming logic using OpenSim and Scratch4OS in 3D virtual environments.
Learners can explain programming task-solving processes through peer feedback exchanges in virtual communities.
Learners can visually analyze algorithm execution results via digital outputs (avatar movements/game elements) generated in simulation environments.

resources: VR Headset or Tablet Device (Available for Loan)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
